subject: Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
lead_paragraph: The world championship leader Casey Stoner of Australia led from start to finish and claimed his sixth MotoGP win this season yesterday at the United States Grand Prix at Laguna Seca Raceway in Monterey, Calif.Stoner, 21, who was the pole-sitter and won all three practice sessions on the 11th stop on the 18-race circuit, was never challenged and came home well in front on his Ducati in 44 minutes 20.325 seconds.
